1.title: Supremacy of Christ
1.keyEvent: God speaks through His Son, superior to angels

2.title: Warning Against Neglect
2.keyEvent: Christ made lower than angels to save mankind

3.title: Christ Greater Than Moses
3.keyEvent: Jesus as faithful Son over God's house

4.title: Rest for the People of God
4.keyEvent: Promise of entering God's rest through faith

5.title: Christ the High Priest
5.keyEvent: Jesus appointed high priest after Melchizedek's order

6.title: Warning and Encouragement
6.keyEvent: Exhortation to maturity and perseverance in faith

8.title: New Covenant Established
8.keyEvent: Jesus as mediator of a better covenant

9.title: Earthly and Heavenly Sanctuaries
9.keyEvent: Christ's sacrifice surpasses old covenant rituals

11.title: Faith Exemplified
11.keyEvent: Heroes of faith commended for their trust in God

12.title: Run with Endurance
12.keyEvent: Encouragement to persevere and avoid sin

13.title: Final Exhortations
13.keyEvent: Practical instructions for Christian living and faith
